sys_script_include.name: ReserveItUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_1aaeed2f934a0210292f73118bba10cf
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1317506_reservei.ReserveItUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ReserveItUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var ReserveItUtils = Class.create();
ReserveItUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	type: 'ReserveItUtils',
	getRoomRate: function () {
		var roomId = this.getParameter('sysparm_roomId');
		var roomGR = new GlideRecord('x_1317506_reservei_reserveit_rooms');
		roomGR.get('sys_id', roomId);
		return roomGR.getValue('room_rate');
	},
	getDateDiff: function () {
		var startDateString = this.getParameter('sysparm_startDate');
		var endDateString = this.getParameter('sysparm_endDateString');

		// Split the date strings into year, month, and day components
		var startDateComponents = startDateString.split('-');
		var endDateComponents = endDateString.split('-');

		// Create Date objects from the components (subtract 1 from month index because JavaScript months are 0-indexed)
		var startDate = new Date(parseInt(startDateComponents[0]), parseInt(startDateComponents[1]) - 1, parseInt(startDateComponents[2]));
		var endDate = new Date(parseInt(endDateComponents[0]), parseInt(endDateComponents[1]) - 1, parseInt(endDateComponents[2]));

		// Calculate the difference in milliseconds
		var differenceInMilliseconds = endDate - startDate;

		// Convert milliseconds to days
		var differenceInDays = Math.floor(differenceInMilliseconds / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));

		return differenceInDays.toFixed(0);
	}
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ignashuu</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-14 19:39:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>1aaeed2f934a0210292f73118bba10cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ReserveItUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ReserveIt" source="x_1317506_reservei">309a10ee93210210292f73118bba109e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ReserveIt">309a10ee93210210292f73118bba109e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1aaeed2f934a0210292f73118bba10cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ignashuu</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-14 19:39:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
